update dms_main_project
project_creation_time = #{projectCreationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_source = #{customerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_phone = #{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sales_area = #{salesArea,jdbcType=BIGINT},
unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
design_sales_cost = #{designSalesCost,jdbcType=BIGINT},
design_cost = #{designCost,jdbcType=BIGINT},
profit = #{profit,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amount_returned = #{amountReturned,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amount_receivable = #{amountReceivable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amount_spent = #{amountSpent,jdbcType=BIGINT},
amounts_payable = #{amountsPayable,jdbcType=BIGINT},
contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
production = #{production,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dms_main_project set project_creation_time = #{projectCreationTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_source = #{customerSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, place = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR} customer_phone = #{customerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_area = #{salesArea,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cost_price = #{costPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, design_sales_cost = #{designSalesCost,jdbcType=BIGINT}, design_cost = #{designCost,jdbcType=BIGINT}, profit = #{profit,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount_returned = #{amountReturned,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount_receivable = #{amountReceivable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amount_spent = #{amountSpent,jdbcType=BIGINT}, amounts_payable = #{amountsPayable,jdbcType=BIGINT}, contract_no = #{contractNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, add_user = #{addUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, production = #{production,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update dms_main_project
design_sales_cost = #{designSalesCost,jdbcType=BIGINT},
design_cost = #{designCost,jdbcType=BIGINT},
profit = #{profit,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select from dms_main_project where 1=1
order by id desc limit #{startPage},${pageRows}

select project_creation_time as projectCreationTime, customer_code as customerCode from dms_main_project WHERE 1=1 and project_creation_time like CONCAT(#{projectCreationTime},'%')
and customer_code like CONCAT(#{customerCode},'%')
order by id desc limit 1
